Description: These were found in the bottom of a box from a local estate. We aren't experts and know there are fakes out there for everything. These are being sold as-is. You decide if they are real. Construction is very solid. Lens has Cartier logo and "54". Model number markings on inside of temple have worn almost completely off. Comes with a padded box marked Cartier and "CO 712" on back. Cartier marked lens cloth included. No reserve. Box measures roughly 6 1/2"W x 1 3/4"H x 3 1/2"D. Very good condition. No lens scratches. Fleabite bump to top edge of one lens. Appear light to moderately worn. Interior of box and lens cloth have light soiling. Please view photos carefully as they are a part of the description.
